cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 55 miles ENE of Guantanamo, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, forecast to turn north-northwest across the Bahamas and then northwest toward the east coast of Florida
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (around North Palm Beachâ€“Sebastian Inlet)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch north of Sebastian Inlet to the Flagler/Volusia county line (Florida Atlantic coast)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Golden Beach FL northward to Sebastian Inlet FL, Lake Okeechobee, Haiti, eastern Cuba, and all of the Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning Turks & Caicos and parts of south-central Florida
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Haiti, eastern Cuba, Turks & Caicos, all Bahamas, and the U.S. southeast Atlantic coastline from south-central Florida northward
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional squalls or breezy conditions from outer rain bands expected; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for San Juan, PR
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated outer-band showers possible, but heavy accumulations not anticipated
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated surf and rip-current risk along north and east-facing beaches
